com.flowpowered.persistence.config

Class AbstractConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.persistence.config.AbstractConfigurationNodeSource
      • com.flowpowered.persistence.config.AbstractConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration, ConfigurationNodeSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IniConfiguration, MapBasedConfiguration

    public abstract class AbstractConfiguration
extends AbstractConfigurationNodeSource
implements Configuration
    A basic implementation of Configuration using ConfigurationNodeSource method implementations from AbstractConfigurationNodeSource

      • loadToNodes

        protected abstract Map<String,ConfigurationNode> loadToNodes()
                                                      throws ConfigurationException
        Implementations can use this method to provide the necessary data for calls of load.
        Returns:
        A map with raw configuration data
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - when an error occurs while loading.

      • saveFromNodes

        protected abstract void saveFromNodes(Map<String,ConfigurationNode> nodes)
                               throws ConfigurationException
        Save the data from this configuration. This method is called from save()
        Parameters:
        nodes - Configuration as a set of nested ConfigurationNodes
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - When an error occurs while saving the given data.

      • splitNodePath

        public String[] splitNodePath(String path)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Split the provided path into a string array suitable for accessing the correct configuration children. Normally this just splits the path with the Configuration.getPathSeparator(), but can limit how deep a child path can go or whether this configuration can even have children.
        Specified by:
        splitNodePath in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        path - The path to split
        Returns:
        The connectly split path.

      • ensureCorrectPath

        public String[] ensureCorrectPath(String[] rawPath)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Make sure the provided path meets the requirements. A correct implementation of Configuration will impose the same restrictions on this and Configuration.splitNodePath(String), so invoking this method on an array from Configuration.splitNodePath(String) would return the original array.
        Specified by:
        ensureCorrectPath in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        rawPath - The raw path of the configuration
        Returns:
        The corrected input path

      • getPathElements

        public String[] getPathElements()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNodeSource
        Returns the elements of the configuration path going to this node source. Can return an empty array if we are at the root of the tree.
        Specified by:
        getPathElements in interface ConfigurationNodeSource
        Returns:
        the elements to here
